Creating Quick Look Thumbnails to Previe.title: Creating Quick Look Thumbnails to Preview Files in Your App

abstract.text: Generate thumbnails of images, text files, PDFs, audio files, videos, and more.

Providing Thumbnails of Your Custom File.title: Providing Thumbnails of Your Custom File Types

abstract.text: Implement a Thumbnail Extension to allow the operating system and other apps to display thumbnails of your custom files.
